summary: Provides a suite of internal validation routines that examine the configuration of a Django ModelAdmin, checking field lists, fieldsets, filters, form classes, ordering, prepopulated fields, radio fields, raw ID fields, read‑only fields and the view‑on‑site URL, and aggregates any issues through a public check operation.
business_intent: Automatically detect and report misconfigurations in Django admin classes so developers can correct invalid field references, improper option structures, and other setup errors before they cause runtime failures, thereby improving the reliability and maintainability of admin interfaces.
